creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play The Syllabary Copybook of the Treasury of Loyal Retainers (Kanadehon Chūshingura 仮名手本忠臣蔵), performed at the Osaka Chikugo Theater, 9th lunar month 1849.
title: Actor Mimasu Daigorō IV as Kō no Moronao
